publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. D[awson] for Francis Eglesfield, and are to be sold at the signe of the Mary-gold in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: An issue, with cancel title page and different imprint, of: Baker, Richard. Meditations and disquisitions upon the seven penitentiall psalmes.
In this edition, title page has "psalmes"; a variant has "Psalmes".
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
